sense.gloss: to sprinkle on (from above), to water (e.g. plants), to pour onto, to spray
to concentrate one's energy (strength, attention, etc.) on, to devote to, to fix (one's eyes) on
to flow into (e.g. of a river), to run into, to drain into
to fall (of rain, snow), to pour down

sdata.j: ワイン↑畑↑↓はたけ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には、↑未↑↓いま↓だ↑地下↑↓ちか↓↑水↑↓すい↓を↑使用↑↓しよう↓した灌漑を↑選択↑↓せんたく↓するところもある。
sdata.e: Some vineyards still choose to irrigate using underground water sources.
